name: debatesynergy.com
description: Debate Synergy is a web app for high school and college debate teams to store online research, discuss debate in the forums, and livestream debate rounds.

scripts.mongo: nohup service mongodb stop &&  rm -f db/mongod.lock &&  mongod --dbpath=db --smallfiles --nojournal &
scripts.setup: npm install forever -g && mkdir db && mv node_modules/mongo-express/config.default.js node_modules/mongo-express/config.js
